precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
action: Click the 'Start' button on the taskbar.

precondition: The Windows XP Start menu is open and the mouse cursor is hovering over the 'Control Panel' option. A yellow tooltip box describing the Control Panel is visible.
action: Click on 'Control Panel' in the Start menu.

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel is open and in Category view.
action: Click on the "Appearance and Themes" category.
expected_results: The "Appearance and Themes" category will become highlighted.

precondition: The "Appearance and Themes" window is open within the Windows XP Control Panel.
The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Themes" tab is active.
expected_results: The "Screen Saver" tab will become active. The preview pane will display a screen saver preview. The "OK" and "Apply" buttons will become active.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
action: Click the 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu and select 'None'.
expected_results: The screen saver setting will change to 'None'.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu in the "Display Properties" window is open.
action: Click the "10" entry in the "Wait:" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Wait:" field will change to "10" and the "Screen Saver" dropdown menu will close.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
action: Click the 'Power...' button in the 'Monitor power' section.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will open.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Home/Office Desk" power scheme is selected.
action: Click the "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu will expand, displaying a list of time options.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu is visible.
action: Click the "After 5 hours" option within the "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Turn off monitor" dropdown selection will change to "After 5 hours".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected.
action: Click the "Power schemes" dropdown menu and select "Always On".
expected_results: The selected power scheme will change to "Always On".

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open and the 'Power Schemes' tab is active. The 'Always On' option in the 'Power schemes' dropdown menu should be visible.
action: Click the 'Always On' option in the 'Power schemes' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The 'Always On' power scheme will be selected.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Always On" power scheme is selected.
action: Click the "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu will expand, displaying a list of time options.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open and the 'Always On' power scheme is selected.
action: Click the dropdown menu next to 'Turn off monitor' and select 'After 20 mins'.
expected_results: The 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu will display 'After 20 mins'.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open and the 'Always On' power scheme is selected. The 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu is open.
action: Click the 'Never' option in the 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu will show 'Never' as the selected option. The 'Cancel' button will become unhighlighted.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open and the 'Always On' power scheme is selected.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will close and the selected power settings will be applied.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open, showing the 'Screen Saver' tab. The 'Cancel' button is visible.
expected_results: The 'Display Properties' window will close. No changes to the screen saver settings will be applied.

precondition: The 'Appearance and Themes' window of the Windows XP Control Panel is open. The 'Display' icon is visible below the text 'or pick a Control Panel icon'.
